formatDescription: Origin is an advanced plotting, graphing and data-analysis application by OriginLab. An .opj file is a full Origin project file in the OPJ format. An .ogg file contains only a graph. An ogw file contains only a workbook. An ogm file contains only a matrixbook Please contact the PRONOM team if you can provide a more detailed description of this format.
provenanceCompoundName: University of Edinburgh / University of Edinburgh

internalSignatures.name: Origin Project Format Non-Unicode
internalSignatures.note: BOF Header, "CPYA ", Major version, "." {Minor version, Build number}, "#". A 'W64' string is sometimes present between the build number and the terminating hash character which may indicate a 64 bit file version but further research is required to confirm.
